data.text: @arianesconrad Hello Ariane, we  inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you.
@iurifarenzena Olá Iuri, pedimos desculpa pela demora e informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@tatiara6 @tatiara6 Olá TATIANA, pode indicar-nos o número do processo de irregularidade de bagagem? Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem direta.  
Obrigada.
@marive_casimiro @marive_casimiro Olá, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.
@anaimmoreira em caso de cancelamento devido a irregularidade da responsabilidade da companhia, o passageiro poderá pedir a restituição do valor pago pelo bilhete. (2/2)
@anaimmoreira Embora não tenha indicado a sua reserva para verificação, a título informativo, ao abrigo das condições gerais de transporte, podemos indicar que, (1/2)

@seeba83 @seeba83 Hello Sebastian, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We verify that your complaint is still under analysis. You will receive a reply by e-mail as soon as it is concluded.  
We appreciate your understanding.
@elsa_carreno We have replied, Elsa. Thank you.
@elrincondesaan1 @elrincondesaan1 Hello Sandy, we replied by direct message. Thank you.
@elsa_carreno Hello Elsa, how can we help through this channel? Send us a direct message with the issue or query. We are available.

@Elena_Romaest Hello Elena, we sincerely regret that the experience did not meet your expectations. If have you already filled in the form, it will be analysed and you will receive a reply by e-mail as soon as the analysis is concluded.  We will remain available for future questions. Thank you.
@MrRaf96 Hello Rafeul, we appreciate and welcome your feedback, and we are sorry to read that. It has been taken into consideration and reported for service improvement. We remain available.

@fenner_michael @fenner_michael Hello Michael, we sincerely regret that the services did not meet your expectations. We verified that the complaint is under analysis. As soon as it is concluded you will receive a reply by e-mail. We kindly ask you to wait for that reply. 
Thank you.

@MostafaToniHala @mostafatonihala Hello, we are sorry for the inconvenience this situation may have caused. We verified that the case is still under analysis. As soon as it is concluded you will receive a reply by e-mail. We kindly ask you to wait for that reply.  
Thank you in advance.

@jader_lc @jader_lc Olá Jader,
Informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada

@AsiaGeo62799489 Hello Asia, we apologize for the delay on our reply which is due to a higher number of requests currently received.
In order to verify, we kindly ask you to send us your lost luggage report number (PIR) and booking reference by private message. Thank you.

@MarisaChisena @marisachisena Hello Marisa, we apologize for any constraint. In order to be able to verify the situation we kindly ask you to provide us with your booking code by direct message.  
Thank you.
@Nicole_H31 Hello Nicole, we inform you that we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@Mlourdes1954 @mlourdes1954 Olá Maria, respondemos por mensagem direta. Obrigada.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Travel
domain.description: for travel in specific places and types of travels, e.g., Venezuela travel, Spain travel, road trips

data.text:
@HevMM01 @saltofportugal @visitportugal @OurmieresChris Hello Heather, we regret the distress caused and described situation. 
We inform you that you may forward your request directly on our website, through the following link: 

https://t.co/bwFSKNusL7

Feel free to contact us back if further assistance is needed.
Thank you.

@victoriafimiani @victoriafimiani Hola victoria, lamentamos las molestias ocasionadas. Por favor, díganos su PIR por mensaje privado para verificarlo. 
Gracias.
@luziosousa @luziosousa Hello, we replied by direct message. Thank you.

@_rfcarneiro @_rfcarneiro Olá Rita, lamentamos que os serviços não tenham correspondido às suas expectativas. Por forma a verificar pedimos que nos indique o número do processo (2022...). 
Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem direta. Obrigada.
@payno1978 @payno1978 Hello Tim, we replied by direct message. Thank you.
@hannahmc38 Hello Hannah, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@HubertC02 Hello Hubert, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Can you provide us with the PIR (irregularity report)? 
For security reasons we suggest that you do it by direct message. Thank you.

data.text:
@the__unscripted @UK_CAA Hello Lucy, we apologize for the delay on our reply and inform you that we have reinforced your request, as soon as there is an update on the matter we will get back to you. 
We appreciate your understanding and remain at your disposal. Thank you.

@jose_usandizaga Hello Jose-Usandizaga, we apologize for the delay on our reply which is due to a higher number of requests currently received.
If assistance is still needed, please contact us via private message with your booking reference or e-ticek number. Thank you.
@saratu Hello S, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@jader_lc Olá Jader,
Informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada

@GimmieYoFood Hello Lee,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to the high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We have already answered to your private messages. Thank you
@Marcela45905643 For security reasons, we kindly request that you send the details through a private message. Thank you (3/3)

@Marcela45905643 In order for us to be able to verify the situation, we kindly request that you please provide us with the PIR number (the code you received at the airport when reported the missing luggage, upon arrival). (2/3)

@Marcela45905643 Hello Marcela,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. (1/3)

@lourentuza Olá Residente,
solicitamos que nos indique o seu número TAP Miles & Go através de mensagem privada para que possamos verificar. Obrigado.
@leavecunt De nada, agradecemos o seu contacto. ✈️
@gugavai Lamentamos igualmente qualquer inconveniente causado e garantimos que a situação não se encontra esquecida. Receberá resposta com a maior brevidade possível. Obrigada. (2/2)

@gugavai Olá Guga,
Lamentamos a situação que nos reporta por esta via. Verificámos a mesma e informamos que encaminhámos a questão para que receba resposta ao seu pedido. (1/2)

@Guiselle_xO Hello Guiselle,
according to the information that we have, the luggage will be forwarded tomorrow. You will be contacted as soon as possible regarding the delivery. Thank you.
@leoqueenb For security reasons, we kindly request that you send the details through a private message. Thank you (3/3)

@leoqueenb In order for us to be able to verify the situation, we kindly request that you please provide us with the PIR number (the code you received at the airport when reported the missing luggage, upon arrival). (2/3)

@leoqueenb Hello Blanch,

We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. (1/3)

@josechenxu Olá José.
Informamos que respondemos já à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada
@cryptomanran53 Hi Ran, we already replied to you through a different profile, please contact us just through one. Thank you
@KevinRagan12 Hi Kevin, your complaint is being verified, so we kindly ask you to wait for the reply by email. Thank you
@akulikov97 Hi, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.
@leavecunt Olá Lourenço, a rota irá ser retomada a 26 de março de 2023. Obrigado

@mariacaldp Hello María,
please provide us the lost luggage reference number (PIR) via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@iurifarenzena Olá Iuri,
lamentamos uma vez mais a resposta tardia. Respondemos através de mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@ViviBarros2020 Hello VitoriaBonnaud,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.
@biancaallane Bianca, Como ya informado, luego que tengamos informaciones adicionales, volveremos al contacto. Gracias

@Elena_Romaest @consumidores @facua @RubenSanchezTW Elena,
We apologize and kindly request that you present a formal claim regarding the described situation. You may find the form, on our website's contacts page. Thank you

@bernith_ Hello,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. We have checked your messages and have already replied. Thank you
@JPUnwin16 Hi Jon-Paul, you'll receive a reply as soon as possible. Thank you
@dmadrizl Hi Dayana, you'll receive a reply by email as briefly as possible, but we can't provide you with a reply time. Thank you

@Michael35266538 Hello Michael,
we apologise for the late reply. Please provide us the claim file number via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@JoseeAntonioR Hello José,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.
@carolc1965 Can you please tell us the complaint number? We suggest the details through DM. Thank you

@CKiddMFL Hello Chris,
please provide us the booking reference via DM. Thank you.

@josechenxu Para que nos seja possível verificar a sua questão, solicitamos que nos indique o seu código de reserva. Por questões de segurança e proteção dos seus dados, solicitamos que nos encaminhe os mesmos através de mensagem privada. Obrigada (2/2)

@josechenxu Olá José,
Lamentamos a questão que nos reporta por esta via. Devido ao elevado número de mensagens recebidas não nos foi possível responder de forma mais célere. (1/2)

@FilipeSilva27 Olá Luis, 
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem privada.  
Permanecemos ao dispor. 
Obrigado.

@MariaLFGL Hello Maria,
Since you have already an open claim, we reassure that it will be answered as soon as possible. We kindly request that you wait for that contact. Thank you
@nosoyariadna Hi Adriana, we've requested the correction of refund, so we ask you to wait for the refund, it will be made as soon as possible. Thank you
@Jessica52425735 Hi Jessica, your complaint is still under analysis, so we kindly ask you to wait for the reply by email. Thank you

3 clues, one destination. Are you up for the challenge? 🤔
A city full of diversity, located on the Mediterranean coast, where the nights promise to be unforgettable.We’re talking about 🥁… Tel Aviv!
Book your trip, now with 6 weekly frequencies: https://t.co/5fHID4AgWC. https://t.co/1dNpHDGd5t

3 pistas, 1 destino. Aceitam o desafio? 🤔
Uma cidade cheia de diversidade, situada na costa do Mediterrâneo, onde as noites prometem ser inesquecíveis. Estamos a falar de 🥁... Telavive!
Reservem já a vossa viagem, agora com 6 frequências semanais: https://t.co/5fHID4AgWC. https://t.co/uKKBisw7TL

@cryptomanran Hello Ran, 
We present our most sincere apologies for any inconveniences caused.
In order to assist you, please provide us the lost luggage claim file reference. 
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.
@Ale_rape Hi AleRape, can you please tell us the lost luggage process number that you opened at the airport? We suggest the details through DM. Thank you

@natashasandamas Hello Tash,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to the high amount of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We have already answered to your private messages. Thank you
@dominikjaeger Hi Dominik, we're verifying the situation and you'll receive a reply by email as briefly as possible. Thank you
@carolc1965 Hi Carol, have you made your complaint online at our website? Thank you
@JulieJo56540847 Hi Julie, since you've bought the ticket with a travel agency, the refund must be made with them directly. Thank you
@AndreaGaudio Hi AndyDaddy, your complaint is still under analysis and it will be replied as soon as possible. Thank you

@bookisa4letter Hola Saray,
Contestaremos lo antes posible. Le pedimos que aguarde mientras verificamos su cuuestión. Gracias
@santana_othon Olá Othon, efetuou na altura uma reclamação no aeroporto de chegada? E já efetuou alguma reclamação na nossa página? Qual os números das duas por favor? Obrigado

data.text: @BenDove63625580 Hello Ben, we have replied to your message on Facebook. Thank you.
@melmina For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you. 2/2

@melmina Hello Melissa, we apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. In order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference or the ticket number? 1/2

@teedeedesign Hello Quinn,
We are very sorry for the delay in the answer, fact that is due to the high amount of messages received. 
In order to verify, we kindly ask you to indicate us your booking reference. 
Due to confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to do it through DM. Thank you.

@ImaginaryCard Hello MoMo,
We are very sorry that your experience with us was not positive. We hope that we will be able to better assist you in the future.
In the meantime, if there is anything else we can help you with, please let us know.
Thank you for your understanding.
@diegojatem Hello Diego, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@anaimmoreira Até lá, em caso de assistência adicional, pedimos que nos indique o seu código de reserva e/ou número de bilhete por mensagem direta, por questões de confidencialidade, para podermos verificar. Agradecemos desde já a informação. (2/2)

@anaimmoreira Olá anaisabelmoreira, informamos que não foi efetuado qualquer comunicado oficial a respeito da eventual greve até ao momento. Se tal acontecer, os passageiros afetados serão alertados com a maior antecedência possível. (1/2)

@respect4life Hello thirza, please send us your booking reference and/or ticket number and seat preference to verify, by direct message, for confidentiality reasons. We thank you in advance for the information.
@gabyoshimi Respondemos às suas mensagens diretas, Gabriela. Obrigado.
@karelgarcia Hola Karel, le informamos que su caso está siendo verificado. Recibirá una respuesta por correo electrónico lo antes posible sobre este tema. Gracias.

@wikindira @wikindira Olá, respondemos por mensagem direta. 
Obrigado.
@PJR28979105 Hello PJR, we apologise for all the distress caused by this situation. We have replied by private message, Thank you.
